hero.title: Greater Atlanta Specialized
hero.description: Skilled care delivered with compassion. Every service we provide comes with something you can't find on a clinical checklist: genuine care for your loved one as a whole person, not just a set of medical needs.

servicesIntro.title: Here's What You Need to Know
servicesIntro.subtitle: We could list every clinical procedure we're qualified to perform. We could use impressive medical terminology and talk about our certifications. And yes, all of that matters‚Äîyou need to know we're competent.
servicesIntro.description: But here's what matters more: We understand that behind every 'service' is a person who might be vulnerable, a family member who's exhausted, and a household that's been through more than most people can imagine.
servicesIntro.emphasize: So when we talk about 'tracheostomy care,' we're also talking about the nurse who notices when a patient gets anxious before suctioning and learns to provide reassurance first. When we say 'medication administration,' we mean the nurse who remembers that your loved one's medication routine needs to fit their life.
servicesIntro.tagline: The technical skills are the baseline. The compassion, attention to detail, and genuine care? That's what makes us B'Nore Care.

servicesList.title: Personal Care & Daily Living Support
servicesList.tagline: Because dignity matters in every moment
servicesList.description: Bathing, dressing, grooming, feeding‚Äîthese aren't just tasks on a checklist. They're intimate moments that require patience, gentleness, and respect for your loved one's comfort and dignity. Our nurses understand that how we do these things matters just as much as getting them done.
services: Bathing and hygiene assistance with patience and respect
Dressing and grooming tailored to personal preferences
Feeding support with attention to comfort and dignity
servicesList.realTalk: We know you've probably had aides who rush through care routines or don't notice specific preferences. Our nurses take the time to learn your loved one's preferences and honor them.
servicesList.summary: Our nurses take the time to learn personal preferences and honor them‚Äîbecause dignity isn't negotiable.

servicesList.title: Mobility & Positioning Assistance
servicesList.tagline: Safe movement with comfort and care
servicesList.description: Safe transfers, comfortable positioning, and movement support that respects the patient's body and comfort level. We know that improper positioning can lead to pain, pressure sores, and contractures‚Äîand we're meticulous about getting it right.
services: Comfortable positioning to prevent pressure sores
Movement support with attention to comfort levels
servicesList.realTalk: If your loved one has specific positioning needs or gets anxious during transfers, we'll work with you to develop techniques that feel safe for everyone. No one should dread being moved.
servicesList.summary: We work with you to develop transfer techniques that feel safe and comfortable for the patient.

servicesList.title: Medication Administration
servicesList.tagline: The right med, right dose, right time‚Äîevery time
servicesList.description: Timely, accurate medication management by nurses who understand the complete care plan. We don't just follow a chart‚Äîwe know the 'why' behind every dose, watch for interactions, and communicate with the medical team.
services: Accurate medication administration with multiple verification
Monitoring for side effects and interactions
Detailed documentation of all medications given
servicesList.realTalk: We've all heard the horror stories about medication errors. We use multiple verification systems and never, ever rush. Patient safety is non-negotiable.
servicesList.summary: We use multiple verification systems and never rush‚Äîmedication safety is non-negotiable.

servicesList.title: Tracheostomy Care
servicesList.tagline: Expert trach care with calm confidence
servicesList.description: Expert trach care and suctioning from nurses who've done this hundreds of times‚Äîbut who also remember how terrifying it was the first time they did it. We'll teach you, support you, and be there when you need backup.
servicesList.realTalk: That moment when the trach needs changing and you're home alone? We get it. We're available 24/7, and we'll talk you through it or come to you if needed. You're not alone in this.
servicesList.summary: We're available 24/7 to talk you through it or come to you‚Äîyou're not alone in this.

servicesList.title: Ventilator & Respiratory Support
servicesList.description: Ventilator management, oxygen therapy, chest physiotherapy, and breathing treatments delivered with skill and calm. We monitor closely, respond quickly to changes, and keep the patient comfortable.
servicesList.realTalk: Alarms going off in the middle of the night are exhausting. Our nurses handle vent checks and troubleshooting so you can actually sleep‚Äîsomething you probably haven't done well in months.
servicesList.summary: Our nurses handle vent checks and troubleshooting so you can actually sleep.

servicesList.title: G-Tube & Feeding Support
servicesList.description: G-tube care, feeding administration, and nutritional monitoring. We handle tube placements, feeding schedules, and work with dietitians to ensure your loved one gets the nutrition they need.
servicesList.realTalk: Feeding issues are stressful. Whether it's reflux, retching, or equipment problems, we've seen it all and we know how to troubleshoot. Plus, we'll clean up without making you feel bad about the mess.
servicesList.summary: We've seen it all and know how to troubleshoot‚Äîand we'll clean up without judgment.

servicesList.title: Wound Care & Ostomy Management
servicesList.description: Pressure wound care, surgical site care, and ostomy management. We use evidence-based techniques to promote healing while minimizing discomfort.
servicesList.realTalk: Wound care can be painful, and we know patients might be anxious or resistant. We go slow, we explain what we're doing, and we never force anything. Trust is earned, not demanded.
servicesList.summary: We go slow, explain what we're doing, and never force anything‚Äîtrust is earned.

servicesList.title: Seizure Management & Monitoring
servicesList.description: Seizure monitoring, emergency medication administration, and recovery support. We're trained to recognize seizure activity, respond appropriately, and keep the patient safe.
servicesList.realTalk: Watching a loved one have a seizure never gets easier. Our nurses stay calm, follow the seizure action plan, and document everything so you have accurate information for the neurologist.
servicesList.summary: Our nurses stay calm, follow your plan, and document everything for your neurologist.

servicesList.title: Skilled Nursing Assessments
servicesList.tagline: Clinical expertise with a caring heart
servicesList.description: Ongoing health monitoring, vital signs, symptom management, and communication with the medical team. We catch small changes before they become big problems.
servicesList.realTalk: You know that gut feeling when something's 'off' but you can't quite explain it? We trust that instinct. If you're worried, we're worried‚Äîand we'll investigate.
servicesList.summary: If you have that gut feeling something's off, we trust it‚Äîand we'll investigate.

servicesList.title: Family Training & Support
servicesList.tagline: Empowering you with knowledge and confidence
servicesList.description: We don't just care for your loved one‚Äîwe teach you techniques, answer your questions (no matter how small), and build your confidence to handle care when we're not there.
servicesList.realTalk: There's no such thing as a stupid question. Ask us a hundred times how to do something‚Äîwe'll show you a hundred and one times. Your loved one's safety depends on you feeling confident, and we're here to make that happen.
servicesList.summary: Ask us a hundred times‚Äîwe'll show you a hundred and one. Your confidence matters.

whatWeDont.title: What We Don't Do
whatWeDont.subtitle: We believe in transparency, so let's be clear about our limitations:

items.title: No 'One Size Fits All'
items.description: We don't do 'one size fits all' care plans. Every person is different, and cookie-cutter approaches don't work. We customize everything to individual needs.

items.title: No Random Assignments
items.description: We don't send whoever's available. We match nurses to families based on personality, experience, and compatibility‚Äînot just who has an open schedule.

items.title: No Empty Promises
items.description: We don't make promises we can't keep. If we're not the right fit for your needs, we'll tell you and help you find someone who is.

items.title: No Ignoring Concerns
items.description: We don't ignore your concerns. If something's not working, speak up. We'll listen and make changes. Your feedback makes us better.

serviceDetails.ctaDescription: Every care plan is unique. Let's have a conversation about your specific situation‚Äîno pressure, no sales pitch. Just honest answers to your questions.
serviceDetails.ctaFooter: Free, no-obligation consultation ‚Ä¢ Available 24/7 ‚Ä¢ Serving Greater Atlanta

contactInfo.subtitle: We respond quickly with compassionate answers
